dataObject.content: This is all great news. It now looks like we have a safe, highly effective vaccine that has the potential to significantly reduce many forms of cancer. So why is it also becoming a key target of many anti-vaxxers?

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"this is very biased- vaccine that has the potential to significantly reduce many forms of cancer"}
{"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"This type of vaccine will only work if a person gets the vaccine before they are infected with the virus."}
